mapper.select: SELECT /* PayInterfaceLogMapper.selectAllPayInterfaceLog */ PAY_INTERFACE_NO , MEMBER_NO , PAY_NO , PAY_LOG_CODE , REQUEST_JSON , RESPONSE_JSON FROM PAY_INTERFACE_LOG ORDER BY PAY_INTERFACE_NO

SELECT /* PayInterfaceLogMapper.selectPayInterfaceLogByPayInterfaceNo */ PAY_INTERFACE_NO , MEMBER_NO , PAY_NO , PAY_LOG_CODE , REQUEST_JSON , RESPONSE_JSON FROM PAY_INTERFACE_LOG WHERE PAY_INTERFACE_NO = #{payInterfaceNo}

SELECT /* PayInterfaceLogMapper.selectPayInterfaceLogByPayNo */ PAY_INTERFACE_NO , MEMBER_NO , PAY_NO , PAY_LOG_CODE , REQUEST_JSON , RESPONSE_JSON FROM PAY_INTERFACE_LOG WHERE PAY_NO = #{payNo} ORDER BY PAY_INTERFACE_NO

SELECT /* PayInterfaceLogMapper.selectPayInterfaceLogByMemberNo */ PAY_INTERFACE_NO , MEMBER_NO , PAY_NO , PAY_LOG_CODE , REQUEST_JSON , RESPONSE_JSON FROM PAY_INTERFACE_LOG WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY PAY_INTERFACE_NO
